body.name: Vacuum Cleaners for Home, Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with 80000 RPM High-Speed Brushless Motor, 2200mAh Powerful Lithium Batteries, 5 Stages High Efficiency Filtration, Up to 30 Mins Runtime
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 52 mins
features: [ 2023 NEWLY-UPGRADED MOTOR ] Our cordless vacuum cleaner features a 180W newly-upgraded motor with strong suction on max mode. The cordless vacuum features excellent performance that can help you easily deal with all varieties of dust and dirt such as pet hair, cat litter, dog food and many more!

[ HIGH-PERFORMANCE UPDATED BATTERY ] Our cordless stick vacuum is equipped with 2200 mAh updated batteries and that can run for up to 30 minutes on a single charge! The battery can be removed from the cordless stick vacuum and charged independently.

[ 5 STAGES HIGH EFFICIENCY FILTRATION ] In addition to the traditional 4 stages filtration system, Our stick vacuum is also designed with high efficiency filter at the air outlet to make the exhaust air cleaner, effectively avoiding secondary pollution and bringing cleaner air to the family.

[ FLEXIBLE BRUSH & 4* LED LIGHTS ] The flexible floor brush can swivel 180° sideways and 90° up and down, easily clean in corner or hard-to-reach areas. 4 LED lights illuminates every dark corner, leaving the hidden dust nowhere to escape.

[A GIFT TO THE PEOPLE THAT YOU LOVE] If you love your family, let them know with our mobile and efficient vacuum cleaner! Our hardwood floor vacuum is light, powerful, and very easy to use, thus making this product a perfect gift for them! We do believe the best product should be given to your beloved ones and they will think of you as soon as they see the small vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great cordless vacuum that gets the job done. It’s very lightweight, powerful suction, and has a solid battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Manual was complete, easy to handle, maintain and lightweight. Everything about it is rugged and easy to assemble. Lov e the color and ease of use. Not only do I not deal with cords but exceptional power, fast delivery. Still in process of wall mounting. Very happy and incredible value..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and powerful!
reviews.reviewText: Really enjoy how powerful the suction is. Makes cleaning up dog hair a breeze. Very lightweight and the swivel head makes it easy to get under and around things. Battery life is good also!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy
reviews.reviewText: Nice lightweight vacuum. Great for stairs. Battery has a long life. Works great on carpet and hardwood floors. Works great for pet hair. The light is a nice added feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Really Well
reviews.reviewText: This is a handy gadget. It’s lightweight and easy to use. The charge has lasted as long as we’ve needed to use it. The only con is that it’s a little short, but I’m pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy build quality, good floor light, nice on-off switch, perfect for hardwood floors
reviews.reviewText: Extremely good value for a stick vac. The plastics are thick and sturdy like a Dyson we used to have, the down-tube extends and contracts smoothly, the brush head pivots freely and smoothly and has a good light for finding debris on hardwood floors, and the suction is pretty darned good in high-speed mode. Works very well on our hardwood floors, and even works well on our short berber throw rugs. Comes with a sturdy plastic hanger and a wall-wart charger which plugs directly into the battery. The battery has its own indicator lights when charging, and the battery life appears to match the claims at this early point in its life. In the first couple of days, we've have no trouble vacuuming five downstairs rooms with hardwood floors without needing a recharge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So nice to use
reviews.reviewText: Excellent lightweight cordless vacuum. Easy to store. Good cleaning power and the light helps highlight the areas that need cleaning. It’s a very nice little machine that makes vacuuming less of a chore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is really an amazing light cordless vacuum! I was skeptical that the suction or quality may be cheap but I’m incredibly pleased with my purchase! I really like the ease and lightweight use for my stairs, hardwood, & tiled baths. Perfect for quick cleanups, easy to maneuver under furniture, & easy to store. Suction power & battery works great! I appreciate the extra cleaning attachments that were included with the purchase. Canister is easy to clean. I highly recommend this vacuum!
